text_block_list.text:
This was something that happened when I went 
shopping for training equipment with Gran Alegria……

text_block_list.name: Store Clerk
text_block_list.text:
So you'll be paying with credit. 
Then, please use your card here.

I had forgotten that I had received a new 
card recently. That's because, this was——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: !? T-that card……!!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
It really is! 
That card, it's one that earns you Miles for shopping, right!?
choice_data_list: You can tell just by looking at it?
You can tell just by looking at it?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! 
I've already decided I'll get that one for sure someday!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
……By the way, Trainer-san. Did you know? 
There's a trick to saving up shopping Miles!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
That's right! Compared to your normal savings, it's like 
night and day! The happiness is 2,000,000 Miles more!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Alright! Let's get started on the Shopping Miles class! 
Come with me, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, look at that. 
That's the mark!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
If you shop at a store with that, 
you'll save up way more Miles than normal!

There just happened to be some books I wanted to buy, so I figured 
I'd try it out. And when I used my smartphone to check my points……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: How'd it turn out, Trainer-san!?
choice_data_list: It's true! I got double the points.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Fuufuufuu……that's right, double! 
This is the first step to becoming the Strongest Miler!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Next up, is the Mile Savings Extraordinary Corner! 
Follow me!

And that's how we ended up at the Planetarium. A sky full of stars 
that you can't see in the city. A narrator was telling the story.

text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text:
『And so, there are many Uma Musume named after the stars 
in the sky, and occasionally, their achievements——』

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Ah～that was interesting! It really is times like 
these that can inspire you, don't you think!?
choice_data_list: Yeah! I learned a lot and——
Yeah! I learned a lot and——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
You 『Saved up a bunch of Miles』 right!? ……And when 
you look at all those Miles you've saved up, it raises 
your spirit! Three birds with one stone!

It had been a short while since we left the Planetarium. 
……and suddenly I stopped in front of a clothing store.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Wah, what a wonderful shop! Mile mark spotted too! 
……Trainer-san, is this where you normally go?

I always felt it was a little too stylish for me, so I never 
actually went in. ——But, if it was to save up some Miles……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it really looks good on you! That jacket! 
Style points: 100 Miles!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! Aren't you glad we entered this store!?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: No no, this is the power of Miles, you know!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Miles are the starting point to broaden your horizons! 
You found a new way to live that Mile life!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
And lastly, let's head to the shopping mall! 
That place is a treasure trove of Miles!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
——Alright! 
I suppose that's all I can show you for today.

Before I even realized it, the hours had flown by. 
It does feel like I've learned about Shopping Miles too.
choice_data_list: Thanks, I took up so much of your time
Thanks, I took up so much of your time

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
No, no, I had fun too! Thanks to today, 
Trainer-san has also started to become a great Miler……

text_block_list.name: Campaign Staff
text_block_list.text:
Right now, we're running a Mile Club membership campaign～! 
Won't you take this opportunity to start living the MiLife～?

text_block_list.name: Campaign Staff
text_block_list.text:
Using your Miles, you can enjoy some of the finest sweets～. 
Don't you want to get a taste of the MiLife～?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
MiLife! The finest sweets! ……Wah! 
Do they mean the cake in that photo? So many strawberries——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Wait, what!? That Choco plate at the top! 
『mile』 is written on it, you see!? Amaaazing!

Hearing her words, a sudden thought came to mind. 
……Good. My current Miles should be just enough.
choice_data_list: Hey Gran, if you still have time——
Hey Gran, if you still have time——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
A real 『mile』 choco plate……! 
The sparkly level is 100 Miles!

Illuminated by the lights, 
the cake sparkled like a work of art.

To think I could turn my Miles in to something like this. 
……It really was quite moving.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
……But, is this really okay? 
Using all those Miles you just saved up.

The emotion I was feeling right now was a sense 
of fulfillment at seeing the results of my efforts. 
I had no regrets about using those Miles.
choice_data_list: It's the materialization of all those Miles

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: ! The materialization of Miles……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: ……Thanks for the meal!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: (Chomp!)

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: (This is……this is……!)

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
(So good! ……But, it's not just tasty. 
This emotion, I can feel it in my heart, in my body……)

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: (But why is that? ……——Ah)
『——It's the materialization of all those Miles』

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: (Oooh, that's it. That's what it was……!)

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: ……The Miles don't disappear.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Miles……are forever!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, thank you very much! 
That's a 100 point, gold-star Mile!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: This cake, I won't forget the taste for the rest of my life!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: I already took a bite, but I should get a picture.

I was a little surprised since she seemed happier 
than I expected…… But seeing her smile like that, 
made me want to work hard and earn more Miles.
